text: Three Violent People is a 1957 American western movie directed by Rudolph Maté and starring Charlton Heston, Anne Baxter, Gilbert Roland, Tom Tyron, Forrest Tucker, Bruce Bennett, Elaine Stritch, Roy Engel. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:1950s historical movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Rudolph Maté Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Texas
title: Three Violent People
